Name: Dawid Malan
Teams: England, Middlesex, Dhaka Dynamites, England Lions, Peshawar Zalmi, Barisal Bulls, South, Nelson Mandela Bay Stars, Khulna Titans, Cape Town Blitz, Sindhis, Qalandars, Cumilla Warriors, Islamabad United, Yorkshire, Jaffna Stallions, Hobart Hurricanes, Team Buttler, Pune Devils, Punjab Kings, Trent Rockets, Sussex
Bio: Dawid Malan made a striking entry into international cricket in a T20 international in Cardiff in 2017,demolishing South Africa's attack with 78 from 44 balls - the highest T20 innings by an Engl debutant,From the time he deposited the second ball,over midwicket for six,By the end of the summer,Malan had won a place in Engl's Ashes tour party,with Engl hoping he could play a tough-guy role at No 4,against South Africa  the West Indies,were far from exceptional,with an average of 23,82  only two half-centuries,but Engl calculated he possessed the fortitude ,the know-how to hle an Australian series,He did exactly that by scoring Engl's first hundred of the Ashes series after they had reached the WACA 2-0 down,grown-up innings that was exactly what was needed at a time when Engl were having to answer charges of off-field immaturity
